text: Ivan, Texas is an unincorporated community in the U.S. state of Texas in Stephens county at the junction of 67 Road. As of 2020, it had a population of at least thirteen. It became a town in the 1970's with a population of more than sixty-one. It is situated southeast to Possum Kingdom State Parkin Caddo, Texas, and southwest to Breckenridge, Texas. Category:Unincorporated communities in Texas
title: Ivan, Texas
